commands.name: time
commands.content: Displays what the character knows about the current time.

commands.name: pick
commands.content: Attempts to pick up items from the current location.

commands.name: saves
commands.content: Displays a table with all the save files.

commands.name: rest
commands.content: Rests until healing about three fifths of the character's health.

commands.name: kill
commands.content: Attacks the target chosen by the player.
